summary:
(Midoriya breaks his fucking neck)
Ochako: Oh my god, call an ambulance, Bakugou!
Bakugou: But if I call an ambulance I'll miss...
body:
(Midoriya breaks his fucking neck)
Ochako: Oh my god, call an ambulance, Bakugou!
Bakugou: But if I call an ambulance I'll miss the opportunity to take pictures of this and make fun of this later, and that's something I can't miss right now.

dialogue.name: Ochako
dialogue.label: Ochako:
dialogue.phrase: Oh my god, call an ambulance, Bakugou!

dialogue.name: Bakugou
dialogue.label: Bakugou:
dialogue.phrase: But if I call an ambulance I'll miss the opportunity to take pictures of this and make fun of this later, and that's something I can't miss right now.

summary: Asking Crush Out-Valentines Day Prompt Day 1
body:
Asking Crush Out-Valentines Day Prompt Day 1

Denki x Jirou

Gerne: Fluff 

Denki x Jirou

Gerne: Fluff  

Denki is easier for me to write than Kaminari so please don’t bash on me. Also some swearing here and there skksks.

I’m going to do all of the 14 prompts so let’s-a-go

Also I’m like two days late, let’s see if I can do day two and day three by today

~

Denki was really fucking nervous.  

Like shitting bricks nervous.

He doesn’t know how or when but he was convinced to ask Jirou out.

His fucking crush.

At first, he really liked her as a person. She was badass and has great music taste and didn’t take shit from anyone else. Of course, she would tease him every now and then but he was used to it. She was a chill tomboy, he respected that. All girls are cute in their own ways.  

But it really started to get him to see how she was in action.  

She was fearless.  

And he was in awe.

Then he really noticed how she was, not that he didn’t realize it before, and he fell hard.

All of his friends knew before he even noticed himself. They would nudge him every time she walked by or entered the classroom, giggling like school girls and being obnoxious.

Yeah, he would flirt with all the other girls, like he did normally, but when it came to her, he would instantly freeze or stumble on his words. She was different and he didn’t want to mess that up. So, he went to his last resort, his only hope: his friends.

“Finally, you fucking admit it. Took you long enough,” Bakugou huffed and crossed his arms. “I seriously thought it would take you even longer for your pea sized brain to figure it out.”

“Bakugou! Don’t be so mean to him! His new to this beautiful world of crushing.” Mina exclaimed, clasping her hands together, “My baby grew up.” She wiped away a fake tear and sniffed.

“It’s fine. I’m used to it.” Denki massaged his neck in embarrassment.

“Don’t worry Denki, we’re going to make sure that Jirou will definitely say yes!” Kirishima said, a wide grin spreading on his face.  

They were all currently sitting in the lunch room. Denki was sitting between Sero and Mina. Across from him was Kirishima and Bakugou who Kirishima was trying to calm down Bakugou from throwing a bowl of rice at Midoriya who was trying to talk to him about their next team up.

“You just gotta get to the point, you know, smoothly get onto the topic and steal her heart but not take too long to get to it.” Sero thought out loud.  

“Or you can do something romantic like taking her out to dinner and asking her there!” Mina sighed as she daydreamed how cute it would be.

“Why not just tell her straight up? You know “hey I like you a lot, wanna go out?” Bakugou said bluntly while crossing his arms.  

“You know I can’t just say that! You gotta build it up! You know, ease her into the situation?” Denki winced at his words, not sure if that is the right way.

“That’s my boy, take my advice and ask her after school.” Sero wrapped his arm around him, beaming a bright smile to him. He felt confident. He’s going to do it, he’s actually going to do it.  

The bell rang and everyone threw away their trash and headed to class.

“Listen, just relax about it ok? It doesn’t have to be nothing fancy just say your feelings and see if she accepts them, ok?” Kirshima wrapped his arm on this shoulder as he was walking. “If she doesn’t feel the same way then it’s ok. You’ll always have us by your side.” He looked over to the Bakusquad as they chatted and made jokes. He was so glad to have them.

Denki instantly felt better, his stress leaving his side. But he still felt nervous.  

~

“Hey Jirou, would you mind if you would stay after class for a bit? I need to talk to you.” Denki grabbed her wrist, stopping her from leaving with Momo.

“Uh sure, I’ll see you later Yamomo.” Jirou looked over her shoulder. Momo gave her a nod and a smile appeared on her face. She quickly walked off, knowing what Denki was going to do.  

“So, what’s up Pikachu?” Gosh, he gets soft every time she calls him that. The way she says it doesn’t seem like she’s picking on him. It fits naturally with him.

The classroom was now fully empty. The sunlight was pouring through the windows with the trees on the side, making the shadows inside the classroom looking like a fantasy world.

Denki took a deep breath and composed himself. Just say it. Get to the point.

“So, since Valentine’s Day is coming up and everyone is asking each other out it made me have the courage to tell that I …” A deep breath was taken. This is it. “That I like you. A lot. I think, no, you are a really cool person and I really enjoy being with you and I-” he huffed, stringing the words he wanted to say, the words he has dreamt of. “really, really like you Jirou. And I was wondering if you would like to go out with me?” he rushed his last few words, already wanting this to be over.

There, he said it, it’s out in the open and there’s nothing he can do about it now. He gripped the edge of the table, the pain distracting him. What if he seemed too forced? Is he coming off as a creep? He doesn’t know how to handle this. How is he supposed to talk to her normally after all of-

“Denki.” He quickly snapped out his thoughts. He looked over to Jirou, already guessing what’s she going to say.

“I’ll be glad to go out with you.” she said with a genuine smile.

“W-what?! Are you serious? Are you just saying yes because you feel bad for me?!” Denki questioned. He didn’t expect this.  

“Yes, I’ll go out with you. And no, I am not doing this because I feel bad. I’m doing it because I like you too, you idiot.” She flicked his forehead, the feeling reassuring and snapping back to reality.

Ohmygosh this is happening. This isn’t a dream, he did it. He asked his crush out and she said yes!

“So does 7 sound good to go out?” Jirou asked smoothly, smirking at Denki’s flustered form.

“Y-yeah, I’ll pick you up then.”

“I’ll see you later.” She waved goodbye and left the classroom. Right when she left Denki let out a cry of joy and pumped his fist into the air. Jirou laughed quietly to herself.

~

Tag List: Open! DM if you want to be added or taken away!

@bnhaforthesoul @lifelyaddict @rubyred-imagines @bakuqou @lord-explosion-baku @local-senpai @bakugou-tm @bnha-valentines @graspingeden @ignite-the-moonlight

blog.name: sailorbakugolb
blog.title: hOmOs pArAdiSe
blog.description:
header image by @australet789

icon by @ahgraphics

summary: HERO SONA! Hes called Surround Sound and can produce music and sounds from his chest speakers. He cant actually physically talk...
caption:
HERO SONA!

Hes called Surround Sound and can produce music and sounds from his chest speakers. He cant actually physically talk with his mouth tho- so its usually replicating voices and so on.

blog.name: i-am-bnha-trash
blog.title: i-am-bnha-trash
blog.description: Hello to everyone who somehow maneged to land on this Blog, you can call me Len. I will probably mainly post bnha stuff or other random shit. so if this is you're thing feel, free to stay. :)

body:
when life gives you lemons,…

Izuku:…make lemonade.

Tenya:…take it. don’t waste food.

Katsuki:…don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your fucking lemons, what the heck am I supposed to do with these?

reblog.comment:
